 2019-07552019-06-09,  ,  CIRNAC,  ISC,  ,  ,  , 
ActIndian Oil and Gas Act
SubjectIndian Oil and Gas Regulations
PrecisINDIAN OIL AND GAS REGULATIONS in order to (1) ensure that First Nations and industry have a predictable regulatory environment in which to make investment decisions; and (2) provide for a more robust and flexible compliance and enforcement regime that includes criteria for regulatory decision-making, a definition of the rights and responsibilities of all parties, and clear authorities and tools to encourage compliance.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0196 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
